name: Acrobat
description:
While unmounted:
• Unit ignores movement penalties from difficult terrain.
• Unit ignores damage and status conditions from foe's AOE effects.
• Unit has (Spd + 10)% chance to apply 2{const:gbp:[Mov +2]} to itself for one turn at the start of its phase.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
